Package fi.tuni.tiko

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.tiko.AudioPlayer
public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
AudioPlayer class is used to play different audios in the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AudioPlayer()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void dispose()
    Disposes all music and sounds.
    boolean getMusicBoolean()
    Returns the canPlayMusic boolean Returns the current state of canPlayMusic boolean.
    boolean getSoundBoolean()
    Returns the canPlaySound boolean Returns the current state of canPlaySound boolean.
    void music​(boolean onState)
    Sets the music's on state.
    void playEmotionSound()
    playSwipeSound method plays the Swipe sound if it is allowed
    void playMenuMusic()
    playMenuMusic method plays the menu music if it is playable if the canPlayMusic boolean is set to true, the music user wants to play is played.
    void setMusicBoolean​(java.lang.Boolean bool)
    Sets music to be playable or not playable
    void setSoundBoolean​(java.lang.Boolean bool)
    Sets sound to be playable or not playable
    void sound​(boolean onState)
    Sets the sound's on state.

    • AudioPlayer

      public AudioPlayer()

  • Method Details

    • playMenuMusic

      public void playMenuMusic()
      playMenuMusic method plays the menu music if it is playable if the canPlayMusic boolean is set to true, the music user wants to play is played.

    • music

      public void music​(boolean onState)
      Sets the music's on state. If set to on, will start playing music. If set to off, will pause the music.
      Parameters:
      onState - true: on, false: off

    • sound

      public void sound​(boolean onState)
      Sets the sound's on state.
      Parameters:
      onState - true: on, false: off

    • playEmotionSound

      public void playEmotionSound()
      playSwipeSound method plays the Swipe sound if it is allowed

    • setMusicBoolean

      public void setMusicBoolean​(java.lang.Boolean bool)
      Sets music to be playable or not playable
      Parameters:
      bool - is used to determine if music is enabled or disabled

    • getMusicBoolean

      public boolean getMusicBoolean()
      Returns the canPlayMusic boolean Returns the current state of canPlayMusic boolean.
      Returns:
      canPlayMusic boolean is returned

    • setSoundBoolean

      public void setSoundBoolean​(java.lang.Boolean bool)
      Sets sound to be playable or not playable
      Parameters:
      bool - is used to determine if sound is enabled or disabled

    • getSoundBoolean

      public boolean getSoundBoolean()
      Returns the canPlaySound boolean Returns the current state of canPlaySound boolean.
      Returns:
      canPlaySound boolean is returned

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes all music and sounds.
